shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus “Miracles of Jesus” (fols. 3ra-48ra) (incomplete) I-1) Introduction (fols. 3ra-5rb) - On John the Evangelist as the author of the book; on the creation and the fall of the angels (fols. 3ra-5rb) I-2) Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus “Miracles of Jesus”: 47 miracles, the last one incomplete (fols. 5rb-48ra) II) Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus “Miracles of Jesus” (fols. 49ra-81ra) II-1) Introduction (fols. 49ra-51va) - Story of the family of Adam (fols. 49ra-51va) II-2) Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus “Miracles of Jesus”: 20 miracles (fols. 51va-77rb) II-3) Correspondence between King Abgar and Jesus (fols. 77rb-81ra) (ed. S. GRÉBAUT, "Les relations entre Abgar et Jésus", ROC 21, 1918/19, 73-87)
Additiones 1-3

copyists.copyist: Mentioned as the scribe on fols. 9rb, 9vb, 43va

donors.donor: Additio 1 mentiones ʾabunä Gäbrä ʾIyäsus as the donor. His name was inserted in the supplication formulas in Text I, in hand b (fols. 3ra, 5rb, 13va, 14ra, 14rb, 48ra, 49ra, 81ra etc.) alonside the names of his relatives: his wife Ḍädalä Maryam (fols. 6va, 26ra, 49ra, 54vb, 81ra), his father Mäzgäbä Śǝllase (on fols. 9rb. 11ra, 11rb, 11vb, 12rb, 54rb, 81ra, etc.), his mother Wälättä Mädḫǝn (fol. 8ra, 59ra, 61va, 81ra), his children Täklä Maryam (fols. 8va, 9vb, 11vb, 13ra, 14vb, 81ra, etc.) and Wälättä Śǝllāse (fols. 23vb, 29ra, 33ra, 68ra, 74ra, 81ra).

dcomments.dcomment: Quires A and I-VI (hand a) might date to 18th century (?). Quires quires VII-XI (hand b) might date to a somewhat later period; they were possibly commissioned by the donor of quires I-VI, Gäbrä ʾIyäsus.

txstates.txstate: The leather cover is nearly fully missing. Some fols. are damaged by water and cockled, the text is partly difficult to read. The Ms. has been resewn, the wooden boards probably inverted or even replaced with new ones. Tears are carefully amended on fols. 17, 23, 70, 75, 83. Fols. 2, 48 are mutilated (cut to half). Some of the fols. are of somewhat irregular shape, some are made out of two pieces of parchment.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards, formerly covered with leather which is now missing (a part has been preserved only on the inner side of the front board). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible in the centre fold of the quires, one close to the head and one close to the tail of the codex.

squires.squire:
A(2; fols. 1r-2v) - I(8; fols. 3r-10v) - II(8; fols. 11r-18v) - III(8; fols. 19r-26v) - IV(8; fols. 27r-34v) - V(8; fols. 35r-42v) - VI(6; fols. 43r-48v)- <VII(8; fols. 49r-56v) - VIII(7;s.l.: 3; stub before 6; fols. 57r-63v) - IX(8; fols. 64r-71v) - X(8; fols. 72r-79v) - XI(4;s.l.: 3, 4; two stubs before 1; fols. 80r-83v)>
Quires VII-XI were probably added later.

taunit.mr-info: Fols. 3r-48ra. All data are for fol. 25.
taunit.ln-info: varies from folio to folio; from 21 to 26.
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling. On may fols. (quires I-VI) the scribe did not use the bottom line.

taunit.mr-info: Fols. 49r-81ra. All data are for fol. 49r.
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

ptypeofscripts.ptypeofscript: Hand a: 18th cent. (?). Hand b: somewhat later time (?)

phandwritings.phandwriting: Hand a: poor, irregular; hand b: regular

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a: fols. 3ra-48ra (Text I, quires I-VI), possibly imitates an old script. Hand b: fols. 49ra-81ra (Text II, VII-XI): bears some similarity to hand a, but is much more regular. It cannot be excluded that both parts were written by the same scribe.

otherdetails.otherdetail: Text I The miracles are introduced with word taʾamǝr "miracle" or mǝʿǝraf "chapter". Text II The parts of Text II-1 are introduced with word mǝʿǝraf "chapter". The miracles are introduced with word taʾamǝr "miracle", nagar "speech", mǝʿǝraf "chapter".

additional.det: The note is written probably in hand a. The name of the donor is ʾabunä Gäbrä ʾIyäsus.

additional.cont: Fol. 81r: Unclear note with a list of names (?)
additional.det: Written in Amharic, in a secondary hand, partly blotted out and difficult to understand.

additional.cont: Fol. 81rb-va: Short hymn to Jesus Christ.

extras.extra: - Pen trials: fol. 1v, 79va (?) - Scribbles: fols. 1r, 10r, 28r, 53r, 54r; recent scribbles: 2r, 48ra, 48vb, 49v, 50r, 64v, 65r, 76v, 77r, 77v, 78rb, 80ra, 80vb, 81ra, 81vb, 82r, 82v, 83r, 83v - A short note, barely legible: fol. 48vb Text I - Miracles are sometimes separated from each other by a line of alternating black and red dots (fol. 6va, 12v, 14ra) - Lacunae: fol. 26ra, 77vb. - Omitted letters or words written interlineally, in the same hand: fols. 4ra, 6rb, 9rb, 10rb, 10va, 20rb, etc. - Omitted letters written in the margin: fols. 16va, 18ra - Correction written over erasure: fols. 18vb, 19vb, 29va, 30va, 31ra, 33ra Text II: - Lacuna: fol. 77vb - Omitted letters written interlineally, in the main hand: fol. 49ra - Omitted words written in the margin: fol. 78vb - Correction through blotting out: fol. 51va

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Text I: Readings are indicated by the titles of the miracles or the names of the feasts written in the upper margin in the main hand, encircled with a thin line: ዘበዓታ፡ fol. 5rb; ዘልደት፡ fol. 6vb; ዘቍስቋም፡ fol. 10r ዘሕፃናት፡ fol. 15r ዘጻድቃን፡ fol. 23v ዘደብረ፡ ዘይት፡ fol. 26r ዘጰራቅሊጦስ፡ fol. 27r ዘጥምቀት፡ fol. 30r ዘቃና፡ ዘ{ገ}ሊላ፡ fol. 32r ዘሕማማት፡ fol. 38vb ዘሆሳዕና፡ fol. 40ra ዘቀትር፡ fol. 42ra ዘትንሣኤ፡ fol. 43va ዘአግብኦተ፡ ግብር፡ fol. 45va Text II: ዘአዳም፡ fol. 49r ዘበዓታ፡ fol. 51va ዘሰንበት፡ fol. 52vb ዘልደት፡ fol. 54rb ዘጌና፡ fol. 57rb ዘሰንበት፡ fol. 59ra ዘሐዋርያት፡ fol. 60ra ዘነግህ፡ ዘጸሎተ፡ ሐሙስ፡ fol. 64v ዘጸሎተ፡ ሐሙስ፡ fol. 66r ዘስቅለት፡ fol. 68ra (blotted out): fol. 71va ዘቀዳም፡ ስዑር፡ fol. 73r ዘዕርገት፡ fol. 74ra ዘሐዋርያት፡ fol. 76r in a secondary hand: ዘሌሊተ፡ አርብ፡ fol. 67rb ዘነግሕ፡ fol. 68ra ዘሰለስት፡ fol. 68va ዘስድስት፡ fol. 70ra ዘትስአት፡ fol. 71va ዘሰርክ፡ fol. 72rb on the outer margin, in a secondary (recent?) hand ዘጰራቅሊጦስ፡ 75rb
